entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:49 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:49 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
